name: sticky-hold
short_effect: Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.
